paragraphs.body: The quiz was the main component of this game and was where all trivia questions pertaining to episodes are answered in order to receive access codes for Dark Into Light. Each quiz was meant to correspond to an episode, apart from the first quiz which encompasses the first two episodes, entitled "Night of a Thousand Starts". Every quiz consisted of ten randomized trivia questions pertaining to events that occurred in its respective episode, with each question having a time limit of twenty seconds.

Each quiz was meant to correspond to an episode, apart from the first quiz which encompasses the first two episodes, entitled "Night of a Thousand Starts". Every quiz consisted of ten randomized trivia questions pertaining to events that occurred in its respective episode, with each question having a time limit of twenty seconds.

paragraphs.body: All ten questions had to be answered correctly within the time allotted in order to obtain the secret code at the end of the trivia; if one question was answered incorrectly or was not answered within the given time, the quiz had to be retaken before the code was received. The same question would not be repeated in any one attempt.
